name: Dear Diary (itch) (BPigeon)
description:
A text based horror mystery game where players slowly learn more about the character of Elli and the downward spiral of her mental state. The game attempts to set an environment which makes the player feel uncomfortable and uneasy but also speaks towards the traumas of self-loathing and isolation. This piece may not be able to encapsulate these ideas in their entirety and to an extent may be a bit over the top but it is an attempt to share a fragment of the emotions one can go through.

The game has two endings in which are decided at critical moments within the game.
